propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.delay: Adds a transition delay, to allow a series of SpeedDialActions to be animated.
propDescriptions.FabProps: Props applied to the Fab component.
propDescriptions.icon: The Icon to display in the SpeedDial Fab.
propDescriptions.id: This prop is used to help implement the accessibility logic. If you don't provide this prop. It falls back to a randomly generated id.
propDescriptions.tooltipOpen: Make the tooltip always visible when the SpeedDial is open.
propDescriptions.tooltipTitle: Label to display in the tooltip.

fab.description: Styles applied to the Fab component.

fabClosed.description: Styles applied to the Fab component if {{conditions}}.

staticTooltip.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

staticTooltipClosed.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

staticTooltipLabel.description: Styles applied to the static tooltip label if {{conditions}}.

tooltipPlacementLeft.description: Styles applied to the root if {{conditions}}.

tooltipPlacementRight.description: Styles applied to the root if {{conditions}}.
